article_title: Shatel: Behind the scenes, Bob Mancuso made things happen
article_text:
Bob Mancuso, with brother Charlie, helped bring the NBA’s Kansas City-Omaha Kings and heavyweight champion Joe Frazier to Civic Auditorium. The Kings played games there in the 1970s; Frazier fought Ron Stander in 1972.

Bob Mancuso

Posted: Saturday, March 14, 2015 1:00 am

Posted in Sports, Tom Shatel, Local-sports on Saturday, March 14, 2015 1:00 am.

og.description: His imprint is everywhere in Omaha. But Bob Mancuso isn’t here anymore. He passed away last Monday. The great city he touched is now minus one great man.
